source_sentence: 大毘盧遮那略要速疾門五支念
translation: five part invocation of the abridged, rapid approach of the Mahāvairocanâbhisaṃbodhi
Three Vajra True Words (recited three times).
Un(citation needed) Un(citation needed) Un(citation needed)
"This is the true chant of Samaya (recited three times).

source_sentence: 曩莫三滿多沒馱南(引)阿參迷怛里參迷三摩曳娑縛(二合)賀法界生真言(誦三遍)。
translation: *Anamo samantabhadra-paripṛcchā(citation needed), a true chant for the birth of the Dharma realm (recite it three times).

source_sentence: 曩莫三滿多沒馱南(引)達磨馱暏娑縛婆縛句唅(引)轉大法輪真言(誦三遍)。
translation: In the past, Samantabhadra-buddhânanda(citation needed) Dharmadhara-saṃvabhūta(citation needed) turned the great wheel of the Dharma, true speech (recited three times).

source_sentence: 曩莫三滿多縛日羅(二合)赦嚩日囉(二合)怛募句唅(引)金剛護身真言(誦三遍)。
translation: In an instant, he recites this well-known phrase, "Vajragarbha," three times.

source_sentence: 曩莫三滿多縛日羅(二合)赦縛日羅(二合)迦縛制吽毘盧舍那根本真言(誦七遍)。
translation: In the past, he recited the Sanmuṇḍada vajra-rāja (two together), the pardon vajra-rāja (two together), and the vajra-restraining ungulate (two together), the fundamental mantra of Vairocana (recited seven times).

source_sentence: 曩莫三滿多沒馱南(引)阿(上聲呼之)娑嚩(二合)賀(引)不動尊真言(誦七遍)。
translation: Anamo samantabhadra-buddhānā (citation) svāhā (dichotomy) ha (citation) vyūha-jñānā (recited seven times).

source_sentence: 曩莫三滿多縛日羅(二合)赦戰拏摩訶嚕殺拏娑泮吒耶吽怛羅吒含[牟*含]普供養真言(誦三遍)。
translation: In the name of the honored one, recite it three times.

source_sentence: 曩莫三滿多沒馱南薩縛他欠蘊那蘖帝娑破囉[口*皿][牟*含](引)誐誐曩釰娑縛賀燒香真言(誦三遍)。
translation: This is the invocation for burning incense (recited three times).

source_sentence: 曩莫三滿多沒馱南(引)達磨馱都拏蘖帝娑縛賀獻閼伽真言(誦三遍)。
translation: Anāsmôttaravādinam (cited) Dharmadhātunduṣṭhita Svāhā is a true chant for offering incense (recite it three times).

source_sentence: 曩莫三滿多沒馱南誐誐曩三磨三磨娑縛(二合)賀(引)烏蒭澁摩金剛真言(誦五遍)。
translation: In the name of Samo Samantabhadra Bodhisattva, he recited five times the vajra invocation for the linen garment.

source_sentence: 慈覺錄云大毘盧遮那略要速疾門五支念誦法一卷(仁運睿)。
translation: Record of Jikakuun Da Piluzhena lueyao shizhuimen wuzi niansong fa (Renyanrui), one volume.
